meanings.definition: A suffix forming nouns denoting a state or condition (e.g. happiness, darkness)
meanings.sent1: The quietness of the library helped me focus on my book.
meanings.sent2: The softness of the blanket made me feel cozy and warm.
meanings.sent3: The silliness of the clown made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: The darkness of the night enveloped the city in a blanket of mystery.
meanings.sent5: The stillness of the forest at dawn was both eerie and beautiful.

meanings.definition: A suffix forming nouns denoting a quality or characteristic (e.g. kindness, laziness)
meanings.sent1: Her politeness always made people feel welcome in her home.
meanings.sent2: His clumsiness often led to funny situations at work.
meanings.sent3: The freshness of the bread made it irresistible to everyone in the room.
meanings.sent4: The sharpness of his wit cut through the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The sweetness of the cake made it a hit at the party.
